College_Summary: Dr. R. Ahmed Dental College and Hospital, West Bengal is a premier Government dental college located in Kolkata, in the state of West Bengal. Established in the year 1920, it is one of the oldest dental colleges in South-east Asia. This esteemed college came into existence due to the efforts of the pioneer dentist and legendary visionary Dr R. Ahmed. It provides Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS) and Master of Dental Surgery (MDS) courses in different specialties. This institute has churned out many stalwarts in the field of dental sciences and oral surgery over the last few decades. Notable among them was Fatima Jinnah, sister of the founding father of Pakistan Muhammad Ali Jinnah, who graduated from here.

College_Name: International School of Business and Media (ISB&M)
College_Summary: International School of Business and Media (ISB&M), Kolkata is a private college established in 2004, approved by AICTE and UGC. The college is ranked as the top most B-school by various ranking survey platforms and has more than 9350 alumni across the globe. ISB&M offers PG diploma courses in the discipline of Management across 5 specializations including Marketing, Human Resources, Finance, Business Analytics, Media and Communication Management, Operation and Supply Chain Management and SCOM. Admission is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the previous qualifying examinations followed by Group Discussion and Personal Interview. Candidates can apply to ISB&M online via the institute’s official website.

College_Summary: JIS University, Kolkata is ranked 1st in the category of Multidisciplinary University (Overall Rank 76 in India) and Private & Deemed Multidisciplinary Category (Overall Rank 38) in The Week - Hansa Research Survey 2020. JIS University offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the specialized fields of Science, Engineering & Technology, Pharmacy, Management, Law, Social Sciences and Education. Admission to the JIS University done on the basis of merit, entrance examination and cutoff criteria of the institute. The University provides PhD programs in various courses as well. The University always encourages entrepreneurship and skill development among the students for promoting entrepreneurship, employability and self-employment.

Bengal Institute of Business Studies (BIBS), Kolkata is the only B-School in West Bengal with A** rating from CRISIL and ranked amongst the top 3 Business Schools in Eastern India by The Times of India B-School Survey for 4 consecutive years 2018-2021. The popular courses of BIBS are PGPBM-MBA, PGPBA and DS-MBA in Business Analytics & Data Science program, offered in collaboration with Harvard Business School Online. The institute also offers PGPSCM-MBA in Supply Chain Management and PGPFM-MBA in Finance Management. Admission to BIBS Kolkata is done on the basis of marks secured in CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ ATMA/ GMAT/ CMAT/ BIBSAT. BIBS was ranked among the Best Business Schools in Asia by Asia Education Awards 2022. According to Knowledge Review, BIBS is ranked amongst the 10  Best Institutes for Financial Studies.

College_Summary: University of Calcutta, informally known as Calcutta University or CU, is public-state university located in Kolkata, West Bengal. Established in 1857, it is the oldest multidisciplinary university of Indian Subcontinent and South East Asian Region. Calcutta University is recognized as a "Five-Star University" and accredited an "A++" grade by the NAAC. Calcutta University is ranked 12th among the top universities in India in NIRF Rankings 2023.

Lady Brabourne College (LBC), established in 1939 by the Government of Bengal, is affiliated to Calcutta University. It offers various Bachelor and Master degree courses and is ranked 3rd among the colleges in West Bengal by Education World Magazine. In 2014, NAAC accredited the college with an A grade.

College_Summary: Presidency University Kolkata was established in 1817 and is recognised as an Institution of National Eminence by UGC. After functioning as a leading constituent college under Calcutta University for over a hundred years, the institution was established as a university in July 2010. Presidency University is accredited by NAAC with "A" Grade. The university has 17 departments that offers UG, PG and PhD programs in Arts and Science specialisations. Admission to all the courses offered by the Presidency University are based on marks scored in entrance examination or merit in the last qualifying exam.

Calcutta Business School (CBS), established in 2008, is one of the top management colleges in the Eastern Zone. It is an autonomous institute offering 4 UG, PG and Certification Programs in the disciplines of Management. It has international collaboration with Girne American University and East Michigan University.  The flagship program of CBS is an AICTE approved 2-year fully residential Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) program across 8 specializations. Other popular courses include BBA in Business Analytics, PGP-EX, and PG Diploma for Professionals. CBS also runs certification courses in 2 specializations. Calcutta Business School Admission to PGDM is done through MAT/GMAT/CAT/XAT/CMAT/ATMA and JEMAT Scores. It is recognized by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). .

The Bethune College is a government women's college, affiliated with the University of Calcutta. It is situated opposite the Azad Hind Bagh, in the heart of North Kolkata. This college offers courses in science and arts streams at both UG and PG levels. It has been reaccredited at the 'A' level by the NAAC in 2015 with recognition from the UGC. College_Summary: IQ City United World School of Business (IQ City UWSB), Kolkata is a premier Business School with an outstanding track record of placement and is one of the best techno academic B-School campuses in Eastern India. IQ City UWSB Kolkata offers degree courses in the discipline of Management. IQ City United World School of Business Kolkata ranked 5th by Times of India in the 'Top 10 private B-schools of West Bengal, 2022' category.

St. Xavier’s College is an autonomous educational institution in Kolkata. It was established in 1860 and affiliated with the University of Calcutta in 1862. St. Xavier’s College has been ranked as the top 5th college in India by the NIRF in its 2023 rankings. Earlier in the year 2019, St. Xavier’s College Kolkata was ranked 9th and 7th by The Week for Arts and Science respectively. The higher educational institute provides several Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Diploma, and Certificate courses to students of all nationalities and castes. Courses offered at the college include BA, B.Com, B.Sc, BMS, B.Ed, M.Com, MA, M.Sc, etc. Admission to the college is based on merits and entrance exams conducted by the institute.

The University of North Bengal (UNB), Darjeeling, commonly known as North Bengal University (NBU) was established by an act of 1962 by the Legislature of West Bengal. NBU comprises two campuses situated at Raja Rammohunpur near Siliguri and at Danguajhar in Jalpaiguri.

Scottish Church College, Kolkata, West Bengal was established in 1830 and is affiliated with the University of Calcutta. The college offers UG and PG programs and  B.Ed courses to female candidates. Admissions to this college for different courses are based on Entrance and Merit. Candidates can apply online. The College was ranked #40 for Science and #48 for Arts by The Week in 2019. Some of the eminent recruiters who had visited the College are Amazon, indigo, TCS, Infosys, Cognizant Tech Solutions etc.

Kolkata Medical College was established in 1835 as a Public Educational Institute with the aim of providing higher education in the field of Medical and Paramedical and is recognised by the Medical Council of India (MCI). The flagship program of IMS Kolkata is their 2 year MBA which is delivered in three modes: Regular, Executive, and Blended. Other popular courses include BBA across three specializations, a BCA program, and B.Sc across 11 specializations. Apart from that, the institute also offers UG and PG degree programs in the specialization of Humanities, Hospitality Management, Healthcare, and Media Science. Admission in the UG courses at IMS is based on the MAKAUT CET, while MBA admission requires CAT, MAT, and JEMAT entrance scores. The courses offered at the college include B.A. (Honors & General) in Education, English, History, Political Science, Psychology & Geography ; B.Sc. (Honors & General) in Geography & Economics ; B.A. (General) in Bengali, Hindi, Economics, Journalism, Film Studies, Sociology, Human Rights, Mathematics, B.Ed along with Post Graduation in English. Presently, it is running integrated BA-LLB & BA-LLB (Hons.) programs with an intake capacity of 120 per course. Admission is on the basis of entrance exam conducted by Calcutta University

College_Summary:
NIMAS, Kolkata was inaugurated in the year 1999. The institute is located in Kolkata, West Bengal. It is an ISO 9001:2008 certified urban institute. NIMAS is affiliated to Maulana Abdul Kalam Azad University of Technology (MAKAUT), Kolkata (formerly known as West Bengal University of Technology). It is a private institute. 
The institute offers various undergraduate and postgraduate programmes. Admissions at NIMAS, Kolkata to these courses are conducted every year.
The NIMAS is one of the best colleges in West Bengal to impart quality education. The institute was established with the aim to educate and train students to a level of all-around competence, in the various operations of the industry. The college is well known for its corporate collaborations, and from time to time hosts several seminars from the industry leaders to give a deep insight into the corporate world and industry interface to the students. Several years ago, the college introduced its Industrial Power Certificate programme that is designed to prepare students to be industry ready, which is free to all the regular students at the institute.

College_Summary: Uttar Banga Krishi Vishwavidyalaya is a torch bearer of a new wave in Agricultural Education. The university offers higher education in some most important fields of agriculture in UG, PG and doctoral levels.

Globsyn Business School (GBS) also known as GBS Kolkata was founded by Mr. Bikram Dasgupta, a doyen of the Indian IT industry. The institute has been ranked among the top 34 best MBA colleges in India (Private) by the Indian Institutional Ranking Framework (IIRF), 2024. GBS Kolkata has been recognized with the Institute of the Year - East Award by ASSOCHAM in the B-Schools category at the 16th International Education Leadership & Skill Development Summit 2023. GBS has ranked among the Top 50 B-Schools in India and Top 5 B-Schools in Eastern India along with IIM Calcutta, XLRI Jamshedpur, IIT Kharagpur (VGSM) and XIM Bhubaneshwar according to the recent Business India’s Best B-Schools Survey.

Asutosh College is a pioneer institute of education in West Bengal and was established in 1916. It is the first college in the state which was accredited by NAAC with ‘A’ grade. The college offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Diploma courses in the streams of Arts, Science, and Commerce. Admission to the UG courses is based on merits and admission to the PG programs is based on entrance exam scores. The application process for admission is online with application fee of INR 500/ 200.

West Bengal University of Animal and Fishery Sciences (WBUAFS) was established in 1995. It offers UG, PG and Ph.D. courses in the field of veterinary and animal sciences, dairy sciences and fishery sciences. Admission to most of the UG courses is done on the basis of the WBJEE entrance examination. Eligibility for these courses is 10 + 2 passed from a recognized board. For PG courses, the selection of candidates is done on the basis of a written test followed by a personal interview. Admission to Ph.D. programs is done on the basis of merit in the qualifying examination. Eligibility for PG and Ph.D. courses are graduation and postgraduation passed in a relevant field.

College_Summary: Heritage Institute of Technology, Kolkata, West Bengal is an autonomous institute which is affiliated to MAKAUT, Kolkata. It is accredited by NAAC and NBA and is AICTE approved. The institution mainly offers three programmes, B.Tech, M.Tech, and MCA. The B.Tech programme is a four-year course with 9 specializations while the M.Tech is a two-year course with 7 specializations. Admissions to these courses are entrance based.

Maulana Azad College was established on December 9, 1926. The college functions under the administrative control of The Higher Education Department, Government of West Bengal. Maulana Azad College inherits a history of progressive development since December 9, 1926, when Islamia College was founded by Lord Lytton, the then Governor of Bengal. Immediately after independence, the College was renamed Central Calcutta College and its doors were opened to all students irrespective of caste, creed and religion. In 1960, the college was renamed Maulana Azad College in memory of the great national leader and eminent scholar, Maulana Abul Kalam Azad.

MAKAUT has achieved a band of 101-150 under the NIRF Ranking 2023. MAKAUT has 114 AICTE affiliated colleges, 89 Non-AICTE affiliated colleges. The institute offers courses in different fields like Engineering, Technology, Applied Science and Humanities, and Management and Social Science.

Barasat College offers undergraduate courses in the field of Science, Commerce, and Arts. The College currently offers BA Honors, B.Sc. Honors, and B. Com Honors along with General BA, B.Sc., and B.Com courses. Application forms to admission to the mentioned courses can be filled online.
Barasat Government College was established in 1950, and is affiliated to West Bengal State University (WBSU), Barasat. It is approved by UGC and NAAC and has also received DST-FIST grant in 2013.

College_Name: Barasat Government College, North 24 Parganas, West Bengal
College_Summary: Barrackpore Rastraguru Surendranath College, affiliated to West Bengal State University is one of the premier institutes in West Bengal for Humanities, Science and Commerce. BRSNC college offers BA, B.Com, B.Sc. General and Honours courses as part of its UG Programmes while for PG Course; the college has M.Sc. in 4 disciplines and M.Com in 2 different fields of specialization.
